segments.text: Not completely . Our production process is partially-automated . We use robots on the production line for routine assembly jobs but some of the work is still done manually .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about supply of parts to the production line ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , the parts are automatically selected from the store room using a bar-code system . And there is an automatic feeder which takes them to the conveyor belt at the start of the production line .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They're transported to the workstations on automated vehicles - robot trucks - which run on guide rails around the factory .
segments.speaker: S2
